name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-bot-knowledge-hub-agent
title: Contoso Knowledge Hub - AI Academic & Career Guidance Agent
shortDescription: Intelligent guidance agent for academic and career journeys.
longDescription: Contoso Knowledge Hub is an intelligent guidance agent built on the Teams AI library, designed to empower students in their academic and career journeys. It offers personalized course recommendations, career-aligned planning, institutional insights, and expert-endorsed AI course recommendations.
